Smart Air Conditioner: An air conditioner that can be controlled remotely through a smartphone app, allowing users to adjust the temperature and settings from anywhere.
Air Conditioner with built-in Air Purifier: An air conditioner that not only cools the room but also cleans the air by removing pollutants, allergens, and other harmful particles.
Air Conditioner with Solar Panels: An air conditioner that uses solar panels to generate electricity and power itself, reducing energy consumption and costs.

Air Conditioner with Automatic Cleaning System: An air conditioner that has a built-in cleaning system that automatically cleans the air filter and other components, ensuring optimal performance and longevity.

Air Conditioner with Voice Control: An air conditioner that can be controlled using voice commands, allowing users to adjust the temperature and settings without having to touch the remote control or smartphone app.
